description: Erection of single storey side/rear extension, new glazed door to side and 1no new sash window to first floor side elevation
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

The facing materials used in the development to which this permission relates shall match those of the existing building(s) unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan 2016 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The rooflights in the development to which this permission relates shall be of a conservation style, constructed in timber and set flush with the plane of the roof in which they are inserted. The rooflights shall be permanently retained in this style. Reason: To prevent harm to the significance of designated heritage assets, in accordance with policy 7.8 of the London Plan 2016 and policies CS8 and DM12 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that Condition 3 (Facing Materials), Condition 4 (Boundary Treatment), Condition 5 (Construction Method Statement), Condition 14 (Sustainable Drainage Strategy) for planning permission 20/01769/FUL are hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

Just "first floor" not " rear first floor" was stated in work description also associated changes to fenestration were not stated."Erection of single-storey rear and first floor rear extensions, 2no side dormer roof extensions to facilitate loft conversion. Associated changes to fenestration" - Please confirm you agree with this work description.Please confirm description of works as the application form description does not correspond with the proposed works in the plans and/or supporting documents.  Confirmation can be in writing or by amending the plans to reflect the proposals.Note: Any documentation with the incorrect proposals will need to be resubmitted, this includes the description of works section on the application form.
